description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Ratatouille recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Ratatouille Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 green capsicum, cored, deseeded and cut into bite-sized chunks
1 red capsicum, cored, deseeded and cut into bite-sized chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Cut a couple of slashes across each chicken thigh and season with salt and pepper. Heat the oil in a large deep frying pan, add the chicken and cook over a high heat for 5 minutes, turning occasionally.
Add the onion, eggplant, capsicum, zucchini and garlic and cook for 10 minutes or until softened, adding a little water if the mixture becomes too dry.
Add the tomatoes and sugar, season with salt and pepper and bring to the boil, stirring. Reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in the basil and serve.
